text:
- [Voiceover] Fueling the
world is a 24/7 operation.
Millions of pieces of equipment
to run well sites around the globe.
For upstream oil and gas operators,

meeting our energy needs
means keeping a watchful eye.
Operators are faced with equipment
that performs suboptimally
and high equipment failure rates,
which lead to unplanned time

- Maintenance teams spend much
of their time firefighting
and reacting to unplanned downtime events

- [Voiceover] Downtime
the industry cannot afford

when it comes to meeting
daily production targets.

- According to the U.S.
Department of Energy,
predictive maintenance saves eight to 12%
over preventative maintenance costs.
- [Voiceover] The equipment, health,

and performance
optimization solution on AWS
is an important tool.

It enables operators by
providing real time visibility to

and insights on equipment
health and performance,
prediction of equipment failure days
or weeks ahead of proactive maintenance,

and optimization of equipment
to improve performance.

The solution consists of
technology accelerators,

such as reference architecture,
cloud formation templates,

and documentation to
support customers who want
to build their own solution.
It also provides out-of-the box solutions

from partners who solve
these specific challenges.

Explore the solution and
learn how equipment health
and performance optimization

on AWS can benefit your
upstream oil and gas operation.
